SummaryEnglish:
After school, ten-year-old Wataru doesn't go straight home--instead he slips into an alternate world where he is the pilot of a huge super-deformed comical robot and fights to deliver the world from the oppression of an evil magician.

This series proved so popular in Japan that it was later remade as Chou Majin Eiyuuden Wataru.
Aliases: Mashin Eiyuden Wataru Shichikon no Ryujinmaru
MASHIN HERO WATARU THE SEVEN SPIRITS OF RYUJINMARU
魔神英雄伝ワタル 七魂の龍神丸

1.TitleEnglish: Shin Mashin Hero Wataru - Majinyama Hen - Return of the Messiah
1.SummaryEnglish: In the peaceful village of Monja, a battered girl named Tonari appears, seeking help. She is the granddaughter of Tonkararin, the demon blacksmith on Majin Island. Tonkararin and Tonari were attacked by invaders from the demon realm but were rescued and brought to Monja Village. Meanwhile, Wataru, despite his upcoming date, rushes to Majin Island upon hearing about a crisis in Sōkaizan. There, he confronts the villains and battles their summoned demons. In a desperate moment, Tonari is taken hostage and reveals the location of the Emperor Dragon.

2.TitleEnglish: Shin Mashin Hero Wataru -Majinyama Hen- Revive the Legendary Emperor Dragon
2.SummaryEnglish: Wataru and his friends reach Dragon Cape. They rescue Tonari from the clutches of KinKakk and GinKakk, who were trying to extract information about the Emperor Dragon. Himiko disguises herself as Tonkararin to confuse the enemy. Wataru finds the Emperor Dragon's resting place and successfully revives it. Shoryuuko and Jyakomaru join the battle, while Wataru faces off against KinKakk. The Emperor Dragon's power strengthens their mechas, and they defeat the combined demons of Jigokushura and Onibenkei. Gendragon-sai returns to his true form, and peace is restored to Majin Island.

2.SummaryEnglish: The second TV series of the popular anime. From episode 29, the title was changed to "Mashin Hero Wataru 2 Super Fight". Wataru, the savior who rescued Mt. Sokai from demons. That peace was also short-lived, when Dwalder, the younger brother of Doakuder, invaded Mt. Hoshikai, which exists in the sky above the same divine world. Knowing this, Wataru sets out to subdue Dwalder...

4.TitleEnglish: Mashin Hero Wataru - The Seven Spirits of Ryujinmaru
4.SummaryEnglish: Senbe Wataru has played the role of a savior many times and saved Sokaiyama from crisis. However, the biggest pinch comes to Wataru! In response to the summons, Wataru came to Mt. Sokai, where an accident had occurred, but what he saw there was an upside-down Mt. Sokai shimmering like a mirage. In the end, Ryujinmaru's power was sealed away by the dark presence of evil, and he was torn apart. A time of trial given to Wataru after losing Ryujinmaru. Shibaraku, Himiko, and Toraoh-the journey of the savior Wataru begins again with his former friends!

1.SummaryEnglish:
"Mt. Soukai is in danger and Wataru is here to save it again. However, Ryujinmaru was broken into pieces during the fight with the mysterious enemy "Dobazudar"!
Wataru fell into despair, but suddenly he heard Ryujinmaru’s voice. Ryujinmaru is still alive! Then Wataru sees a vision of Mt. Sokai being upside down.
That place is called "Mt. Musokai", "the dream of the dragon". It's located somewhere unknown.
Knowing Ryujinmaru is in that world, Wataru is here again, on an adventure with Toraoh and Himiko.
